array.string:
[libdefaults] default_realm = LKDC:SHA1.D0649BAA5F1ADD13B5FEE2729DCCCC5210DDD94B
[kdcdefaults] kdc_ports = 88 kdc_tcp_ports = 88
[realms] LKDC:SHA1.D0649BAA5F1ADD13B5FEE2729DCCCC5210DDD94B = { kadmind_port = 749 max_life = 10h 0m 0s max_renewable_life = 7d 0h 0m 0s master_key_type = des3-hmac-sha1 supported_enctypes = des3-hmac-sha1:normal aes128-cts:normal aes256-cts:normal acl_file = /var/db/krb5kdc/kadm5.acl admin_keytab = /var/db/krb5kdc/kadm5.keytab database_name = /var/db/krb5kdc/principal.LKDC:SHA1.D0649BAA5F1ADD13B5FEE2729DCCCC5210DDD94B key_stash_file = /var/db/krb5kdc/.k5.LKDC:SHA1.D0649BAA5F1ADD13B5FEE2729DCCCC5210DDD94B } [logging] kdc = FILE:/var/log/krb5kdc/kdc.log admin_server = FILE:/var/log/krb5kdc/kadmin.log
